objective: Work alongside MI6 to dismantle an international cybercrime syndicate operating in the United Kingdom.

failure.message: The cybercriminals evaded capture and erased all traces of their operations. Your mission was exposed, damaging relations with MI6.

neutral.message: The syndicate was disrupted, but key members escaped. While some intelligence was gained, the operation remains unfinished.

success.message: The cybercriminal network has been completely dismantled, and critical intelligence was secured. Your cooperation with MI6 strengthens future joint operations.
